title: Christine's quiche Lorraine
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '200g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '75g softened butter', '5-6 tablespoons cold water', 'For the filling', '250g bacon, cut into thin strips', '500ml cream', '3 eggs', '2 egg yolks', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'black pepper to taste', '1 pinch nutmeg']
